GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v5.18.8
GSD.description:
iio: adc: aspeed: Fix refcount leak in aspeed_adc_set_trim_data

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.8 by commit 9664491db50a84be92696c8fad2c3b49a7a5f36f, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit d0a4c17b40736b368f1f26602ad162e24b4108e7. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: iio: adc: aspeed: Fix refcount leak in aspeed_adc_set_trim_data
